post.description: Creates a new account for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves the current balance for the specified account.

post.description: Adds funds to the specified account. Specify the amount, currency,

get.description: Retrieves a list of transactions for the specified account.

post.description: Transfers a specified amount from one account to another.
Withdraws a specified amount from the user's account.

get.description: Retrieves all accounts belonging to the authenticated user.

delete.description: Remove a currency from the registry (admin only)

get.description: Get currency information by ISO 4217 code
Check if a currency code is supported

post.description: Authenticate user with identity (username or email) and password

get.description: Retrieves a list of pending checkout sessions for the authenticated user.
Get a list of all available currencies in the system

post.description: Generates a Stripe Connect onboarding URL for the authenticated user
Create a new user account with username, email, and password

get.description: Retrieve a user by their ID

delete.description: Delete a user account by ID with password confirmation

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type

onboarding_url.description: OnboardingURL is the URL to redirect the user to for Stripe Connect onboarding

is_complete.description: IsComplete indicates whether the user has completed Stripe Connect onboarding

BearerAuth.description: "Enter your Bearer token in the format: `Bearer {token}`"
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
